description: The Fed requires big banks to undergo “stress tests” each year. Kayla Tausche of CNBC examines what happens when unemployment soars, house prices plummet and Wall Street crashes.
title: Inside the Fed Stress Tests
title_page: Inside the Fed Stress Tests - Video - NYTimes.com
text: The Fed requires big banks to undergo “stress tests” each year. Kayla Tausche of CNBC examines what happens when unemployment soars, house prices plummet and Wall Street crashes.
